# currentContextDrawingToScreen()

**Type Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the current context is drawing to the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
class func currentContextDrawingToScreen() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the current context is drawing to the screen, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

This convenience method is equivalent to sending [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSGraphicsContext/isDrawingToScreen] to the result of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSGraphicsContext/current].

## Testing the Drawing Destination

- **isDrawingToScreen**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the drawing destination is the screen.
